name: thesaurus
description: Your job is to implement a command-line [Thesaurus](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thesaurus) tool in Node.js using TypeScript. Use the [openthesaurus.de](https://www.openthesaurus.de/) word database as the data source for your tool. You can download the database in text format [here](https://www.openthesaurus.de/export/OpenThesaurus-Textversion.zip).
author: pbrandstetter
